segments.text: Wow , Is winter always this cold in Taiwan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . It's much warmer usually . Your are not used to cold weather ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I am from south California . This is my first real winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , You'd better get some more warm clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would say it's about 5 degree Celsius .
segments.speaker: S2
